title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When launching the Help view on Win2K (20020326), the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The Help view should be launched in a way that enables immediate keyboard navigation.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on Win2K.
2. Press the tab key and observe the lack of any response.
3. Click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
4. Press the tab key again and verify that keyboard navigation is now functional.
